TopicTitle: Lock up reducing time warp from 100x

Articles.Content:
**KSP:** KSP 0.90.0.705 Beta 32-bit / Windows 8.1 64-bit

**Problem:** Lock up reducing time warp from 100x

**Mods installed**:

 ![Capture.PNG?psid=1](https://qvyssw-ch3302.files.1drv.com/y2pG1kNnsrO0U_0P4wUVLsS8MR7vee_rOJC-_dY3dW6Fq7flM3S1c0KMAVDzUy5rPjslWDTvIO8UAxvqGpMAjjbJVhaK6618JhGzq6mrFuhiT7U5CIWHXcFcJuiLMJv7g_IDPj9WvGBd1YARw0S61j3tA/Capture.PNG?psid=1)

**Reproduction steps:**

Frequently when I or Kerbal alarm clock reduce the time warp below 100x after being at high warp a while, the game will freeze. If I click Windows asks me if I want to close KSP because its not responding. At first I thought it was a memory issue but I'm not going over I don't think. I'm using opengl and I've pruned out most of the tanks. 

**Log:**
